2.text: When you create a new library, the library perspective appears.

3.text: The name of the perspective is Lib Design.

4.text: Can this use full words, instead of contractions: Library Design.

6.text: The message shown in the new empty library is: Library currently empty, add components from the palette or the menu to the library outline menu.

7.text: Better wording is: This library is empty.

8.text: Add components to the library outline from the palette or the menu.

10.text: The color of the new empty library in the editor is too dark.

11.text: This color makes it difficult to read the message.

12.text: Use a lighter gray, or even white.
